lead_paragraph: Real estate investment funds, which produce income from sources like malls and data centers, are appealing but some potential pitfalls loom.

headline.print_headline: The Risk in Building on a Profitable Past
headline.main: The Risk of Building on Real Estate Funds’ Profitable Past

snippet: Real estate investment funds, which produce income from sources like malls and data centers, are appealing but some potential pitfalls loom....
abstract: Analysts warn mutual fund REITs, or publicly traded real estate investment trusts, may not be able to sustain their remarkable 15-year performance due to looming possibilities of economic recession and hike in interest rates; say so-called fortress malls, industrial real estate and data storage centers are good bets, but high share prices should make investors particularly cautious when choosing.
